title: Scoop: Israel forms damage control team after NSO Pegasus spyware reports
content:
1. Scoop: Israel forms damage control team after NSO Pegasus spyware reports  Axios
  2. Heads of state found on list of numbers examined by Pegasus Project  The Washington Post
  3. Amnesty Int'l Calls for Moratorium on Private Spyware After Israeli NSO Group Pegasus Revelations  Democracy Now!
  4. Pegasus Project: Why I was targeted by Israeli spyware  Middle East Eye
  5. Opinion | Spyware is thriving, dangerous and unrestrained. It's time to change that.  The Washington Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: スクープです。NSO Pegasusのスパイウェア報告を受け、イスラエルがダメージコントロールチームを結成
独家报道。以色列在NSO Pegasus间谍软件报告后成立了损害控制小组
獨家報道。以色列在NSO Pegasus間諜軟件報告後成立了損害控制小組
